document.full_text: the u.s. airways airplane that made a splash-landing dubbed the "miracle on the hudson" more than two years ago began a road trip on saturday to charlotte, north carolina, its original, and final, destination.
document.title: "miracle on the hudson" plane departs for museum
lines_and_colors: the u.s. airways airplane that made a splash-landing dubbed the "miracle on the hudson" more than two years ago began a road trip on saturday to charlotte, north carolina, its original, and final, destination.
